data.title: Product Manager, Beta Systems IAM Software AG
data.description: Drove strategic development and management of the enterprise-grade Identity and Access Management (IAM) product suite 'Garancy', delivering innovative solutions and operational efficiencies for global organizations.

tasks.description: Managed the full product lifecycle for a suite of IAM solutions, including web-based client interfaces, analytics platforms, workflow automation tools, and service offerings, ensuring scalable, user-focused outcomes.
Partnered with a 7-member leadership team to craft and execute the product strategy, mission, and vision for a rebranded IAM portfolio, aligning with enterprise security and compliance needs.

Directed cross-functional teams to launch advanced IAM features, such as role-based access modeling, automated testing frameworks, and identity provider integrations, achieving on-time delivery and strong market adoption.
Implemented automation and process improvements across QA, support, documentation, and development teams, leveraging containerized deployments and vulnerability management tools.
Built and nurtured relationships with customers, partners, and analysts through compelling presentations, demos, and workshops, driving brand recognition and securing strategic partnerships.
Led prototyping and research in AI-driven automation and third-party integrations, enhancing product functionality and maintaining a competitive edge.

data.title: Software Engineer, Beta Systems DCI Software AG
data.description: Developed and enhanced 'Beta Admin,' an enterprise solution for document archiving, output management, and log management, delivering robust software components and streamlined processes in a collaborative, agile environment.

tasks.description: Designed and integrated responsive software components and APIs using React.js, Redux, Bootstrap, HTML5, and CSS3, enhancing user experience and functionality within an agile product team.
Executed product roadmap through bi-weekly sprints (versions 5.2.0 to current), implementing user stories and resolving bugs to ensure timely delivery of high-quality releases.
Refactored legacy code following Clean Code principles, improving maintainability, readability, and performance of the 'Beta Admin' platform.
Established comprehensive unit testing (Jest) and cross-platform acceptance testing (VirtualBox) frameworks, increasing code reliability and reducing post-release defects.
Configured and optimized Jenkins pipelines to support efficient CI/CD workflows, accelerating development and production deployment cycles.

data.title: Full Stack Software Developer, ZeroWork GmbH (Startup, seed phase)
data.description: Drove the planning and development of ZeroWorkâ€™s marketplace and app, delivering a scalable no-code automation platform in a fast-paced, agile startup environment.

tasks.description: Designed and integrated responsive frontend (React.js, Redux, Material UI, HTML5, CSS3) and backend (Python, Django, PostgreSQL) components and APIs, building a seamless marketplace and app ecosystem.
Evaluated and implemented the product roadmap for the no-code automation core using Playwright, enabling robust app and marketplace functionality.
Led the migration of the automation core from Python to TypeScript, enhancing performance and maintainability.
Integrated Stripe Payments across the app, marketplace, and backend, ensuring secure and efficient transaction processing.
Developed and integrated a remote scheduler using AWS and Redis, optimizing task automation for the platform.
Owned and executed the Mac release process, ensuring a smooth and timely product launch.
Conducted code reviews and enforced Clean Code principles, improving code quality and reducing technical debt.

data.title: Software Engineer, ZkSystems GmbH (Startup, seed phase)
data.description: Led the planning and development of the cross-platform app and automation core for the ZeroWork.io launch, delivering a scalable no-code automation platform in a dynamic, agile startup environment.

tasks.description: Designed and integrated responsive frontend components and APIs using React.js, Redux, Material UI, HTML5, and CSS3, enhancing user experience within an agile product team.
Spearheaded the greenfield development of the no-code automation core using Python, Selenium, and an RPA framework, driving the product roadmap and enabling robust app functionality.
Built the core product for cross-platform compatibility using Electron.js, Node.js, and Webpack, ensuring seamless performance across operating systems.
Owned and executed the Mac release process, delivering a successful product launch on schedule.
Developed and integrated on-premise and cloud-based queue management systems using AWS SQS, Redis, and Bull, optimizing workflow execution for the app and backend.
Implemented logging and user journey analytics across frontend and backend using AWS S3 and Mixpanel, enhancing product insights and performance tracking.
Conducted code reviews and enforced Clean Code principles, improving code maintainability and reducing technical debt.
Established unit testing frameworks with GitLab CI and Git, achieving over 50% test coverage and enhancing software reliability.
Planned and validated the ZeroWork.io project, aligning technical development with strategic business goals.

data.title: Web Developer, auteon GmbH (Startup, PoC phase)
data.description: Planned and developed auteonâ€™s article comparison mechanism, leveraging browser automation and supplier APIs to create a robust, scalable platform in an agile, proof-of-concept startup environment.

tasks.description: Designed and integrated software components and APIs for the backend, driving strategic and operational agile product development to support the article comparison core.
Tested, maintained, and optimized existing components to enhance robustness, accuracy, and performance of the core product.
Mentored and supported three working students in the automation team, conducting code reviews to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Migrated monolithic legacy code to a modular automation core, applying Clean Code principles to improve maintainability and scalability.

data.title: Technical Account Manager, Hilti AG
data.description: Managed a portfolio of over 700 SME industrial clients in the Berlin area, driving consulting and direct sales to achieve strategic revenue and customer loyalty goals for a global leader in construction technology.

tasks.description: Built and nurtured long-term customer relationships, aligning with company targets while optimizing resource efficiency to enhance client satisfaction and retention.
Delivered compelling product presentations and technical workshops, leveraging Hiltiâ€™s systematic sales approach to provide tailored solutions and drive client adoption.
Collaborated with leadership and technical teams to conduct qualitative and quantitative market research, identifying opportunities to strengthen market positioning and growth.

Earned admission to Hiltiâ€™s Top Club Germany for two consecutive years, recognized by general management for surpassing strategic targets in customer loyalty, revenue growth, and execution of long-term growth initiatives.

data.summary: Generalist with a strong engineering foundation, passionate about delivering innovative software solutions in collaboration with high-performing teams. Committed to empowering mission-driven tech companies to achieve their strategic vision through pragmatic, detail-oriented, and business-focused leadership. Proven expertise in driving product excellence and aligning technical innovation with market needs.
